Articles.Content:
Hello, fellow Kerbonauts! I have been away for quite some time, but now that this version is out, I did some tinkering (I know, who doesn't?) and made a very stable tailless fighter aircraft. You MAY know it as NASA's X-36 TFARA, or if you played Airforce Delta Storm, the F-25C Warbler.

An additional note: You need to have SAS on, otherwise in the air you'll be a wobbly goblin.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/826emx9815rq0lq/AABD9Lb5irhuw6O5AuPZ54pOa?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/kfnggjpujuaxc2t/F-25C%20Warbler.craft?dl=0

As always, enjoy, and fly safe! (Unless you're Jeb...)

Edited October 16, 2014 by BlueFalcon77
